RevenueAndIncome.description: Elements related to revenue recognition, income from operations, and related performance obligation disclosures under ASC 606 and other revenue standards.

RevenueRecognition.description: Revenue amounts recognized from contracts with customers and other sources, including assessed and excluded tax treatments.

PerformanceObligations.description: Remaining performance obligations and contract liability disclosures under ASC 606.

EquityMethodIncome.description: Income or loss recognized from equity method investments.

GainsAndLosses.description: Gains and losses from extinguishment of debt and similar non-operating items.

ExpensesAndCosts.description: Elements related to operating expenses, cost recognition, depreciation, amortization, impairment, and restructuring charges.

DepreciationAndAmortization.description: Depreciation of tangible assets and amortization of intangible assets and financing costs.

InterestExpense.description: Interest expense on debt and other borrowings.

ImpairmentCharges.description: Asset impairment charges including goodwill impairment losses.

RestructuringCosts.description: Restructuring charges and expected costs associated with restructuring activities.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Legacy lease and rental expense disclosures under ASC 840.

DefinedContributionPlanCosts.description: Costs recognized for defined contribution retirement plans.

InsuranceUnderwriting.description: Prior year claims and claims adjustment expenses for property-casualty insurance underwriters.

Assets.description: Elements related to tangible and intangible assets, goodwill, real estate properties, equity method investments, and fair value disclosures.

Goodwill.description: Goodwill recognized in the balance sheet from business combinations.

IntangibleAssets.description: Finite-lived intangible assets and their useful life characteristics.

PropertyPlantAndEquipment.description: Tangible long-lived asset useful life and real estate property disclosures.

EquityMethodInvestments.description: Investments accounted for under the equity method and ownership percentages.

CashAndFairValue.description: Cash and cash equivalents fair value measurement disclosures.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Tax-related operating loss carryforwards recognized as deferred tax assets.

Liabilities.description: Elements related to contract liabilities, contingent consideration, guarantee obligations, and environmental accruals.

ContractLiabilities.description: Liabilities from contracts with customers representing deferred revenue and advance payments.

EnvironmentalLiabilities.description: Accruals for environmental loss contingencies and remediation obligations.

GuaranteeObligations.description: Maximum exposure under guarantee obligations and similar commitments.

StockholdersEquity.description: Elements related to common stock, preferred stock, share characteristics, dividends, and non-controlling interests.

CommonStock.description: Common stock attributes including par value, authorized shares, and outstanding shares.

PreferredStock.description: Preferred stock attributes including authorized shares and dividend rate.

Dividends.description: Dividends declared per share for common stock.

NoncontrollingInterests.description: Ownership percentages held by non-controlling owners and parent entities.

AccountingPrincipleAdoption.description: Cumulative effect adjustments from adoption of new accounting principles.

DebtInstruments.description: Elements related to debt instruments, lines of credit, financing costs, and debt measurements including face amount, carrying amount, interest rates, and maturity.

DebtMeasurement.description: Carrying amount, face amount, and fair value measurements of debt instruments.

DebtInterestRates.description: Stated, effective, variable basis spread, and weighted average interest rates on debt.

DebtTermsAndRedemption.description: Maturity dates, terms, redemption prices, and convertible conversion prices of debt instruments.

DebtDiscountsAndCosts.description: Unamortized discounts and deferred financing costs associated with debt issuance.

LineOfCredit.description: Line of credit facilities including maximum capacity, current borrowing capacity, remaining capacity, interest rates, and commitment fees.

DebtRepayments.description: Repayments and extinguishment of debt obligations.

BusinessCombinations.description: Elements related to business acquisitions, consideration transferred, contingent consideration, and recognized assets and liabilities under ASC 805.

AcquisitionConsideration.description: Total consideration transferred, contingent consideration liabilities, and acquisition-related costs.

AcquisitionDetails.description: Voting interests acquired and equity interests issued in business acquisitions.

RecognizedAssetsAndLiabilities.description: Identifiable intangible assets and other assets recognized in business combinations.

DisposalGroups.description: Consideration associated with disposal groups including discontinued operations.

ShareBasedCompensation.description: Elements related to share-based payment arrangements, stock options, restricted stock units, vesting, and associated compensation costs under ASC 718.

CompensationExpense.description: Share-based compensation expense recognized and associated tax benefits.

UnrecognizedCompensationCost.description: Total unrecognized compensation cost for non-vested awards and the remaining recognition period.

StockOptions.description: Stock option grants, exercise intrinsic value, and grant date fair value.

RestrictedStockAndOtherAwards.description: Restricted stock units and other equity instruments granted, vested, and outstanding.

PlanDetails.description: Share-based payment plan attributes including authorized shares, available shares, vesting terms, and expiration periods.

Leases.description: Elements related to operating and finance lease disclosures including right-of-use assets, lease liabilities, lease costs, and weighted average terms under ASC 842.

OperatingLeaseBalanceSheet.description: Operating lease right-of-use assets and lease liabilities recognized on the balance sheet.

OperatingLeaseCosts.description: Operating lease cost and expense amounts recognized in the income statement.

OperatingLeaseTermsAndRates.description: Weighted average remaining lease term and discount rate for operating leases.

LeaseContractTerms.description: Contractual terms and renewal options for lessee operating leases.

IncomeTaxes.description: Elements related to income tax expense, effective tax rates, unrecognized tax benefits, and tax rate reconciliations under ASC 740.

IncomeTaxExpense.description: Total income tax expense or benefit recognized in the income statement.

EffectiveTaxRate.description: Effective income tax rate and statutory federal rate used in rate reconciliations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefits.description: Unrecognized tax benefits and the portion that would impact the effective tax rate if recognized.

LossContingencies.description: Elements related to loss contingencies, pending litigation claims, estimated losses, and accrued liabilities under ASC 450.

ContingencyMeasurement.description: Accrued carrying values and estimates of possible loss for contingencies.

LitigationAndClaims.description: Number of pending claims and damages sought in loss contingency matters.

FinancialInstrumentsAndDerivatives.description: Elements related to derivative instruments, hedging activities, fair value measurements, and warrant disclosures under ASC 815 and ASC 820.

Derivatives.description: Derivative notional amounts and fixed interest rates for hedging instruments.

WarrantsAndRights.description: Exercise prices and attributes of warrants or rights issued.

ConcentrationRisk.description: Concentration of risk percentages for significant customers, suppliers, or geographic regions.

RelatedPartyTransactions.description: Elements related to transactions with related parties including amounts and expenses under ASC 850.

TransactionAmounts.description: Amounts and expenses from transactions with related parties.

SegmentInformation.description: Elements related to operating and reportable segment disclosures under ASC 280.

SegmentCounts.description: Number of operating segments and reportable segments.

StockTransactions.description: Elements related to stock issuance, stock repurchase programs, treasury stock, and share price disclosures.

StockIssuance.description: Proceeds from and details of common stock issuances and sales.

StockRepurchasePrograms.description: Authorized repurchase amounts, remaining authorization, and shares repurchased under stock repurchase programs.

TreasuryStock.description: Treasury stock shares acquired, average cost per share, and total value under the cost method.

SharePrice.description: Market price per share of the entity's stock.

AntidilutiveSecurities.description: Securities excluded from diluted earnings per share computation due to antidilutive effect.

Other.description: Elements that span multiple categories or relate to specialized industry-specific disclosures not covered by the primary categories above.

DefinedBenefitPlans.description: Employer contributions to defined benefit pension and postretirement plans.

RegulatoryMatters.description: Public utility rate increase or decrease requests and regulatory proceedings.

AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies.description: Accrued liability for environmental loss contingencies including remediation and cleanup obligations.

AcquiredFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWeigh.description: Weighted average useful life of finite-lived intangible assets acquired in a business combination or asset acquisition.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Share-based compensation expense allocated to a specific reporting unit or segment.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amortization of deferred financing costs (debt issuance costs) recognized as interest expense over the life of the debt.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: Amortization expense of finite-lived intangible assets recognized during the reporting period.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Number of antidilutive securities excluded from the computation of diluted earnings per share.

AreaOfRealEstateProperty.description: Area (in square feet or other unit of measure) of real estate property owned or leased by the entity.

AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Impairment charges recognized for long-lived assets when carrying value exceeds fair value.

BusinessAcquisitionEquityInterestsIssued.description: Number of equity interest shares issued or issuable as part of a business acquisition.

BusinessAcquisitionPercentageOfVotingInt.description: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired in a business combination.

BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCos.description: Acquisition-related costs incurred in a business combination, expensed as incurred under ASC 805.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Total fair value of consideration transferred in a business combination including cash, equity, and other forms.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Fair value of contingent consideration liability recognized in a business combination, payable upon meeting specified conditions.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Fair value of identifiable intangible assets other than goodwill acquired in a business combination.
Fair value of all identifiable intangible assets (including goodwill-related) acquired in a business combination.

CapitalizedContractCostAmortization.description: Amortization of capitalized costs to obtain or fulfill contracts with customers under ASC 340-40.

CashAndCashEquivalentsFairValueDisclosur.description: Fair value of cash and cash equivalents disclosed under fair value measurement requirements.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share of warrants or rights outstanding.

CommonStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutur.description: Number of common shares reserved for future issuance under equity compensation plans, warrants, and convertible instruments.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared per common share during the reporting period.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Par or stated value per share of common stock as specified in the corporate charter.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: Maximum number of common shares authorized for issuance under the corporate charter.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of common shares outstanding as of the balance sheet date, excluding treasury shares.

ConcentrationRiskPercentage1.description: Percentage of concentration risk from a particular customer, supplier, geographic area, or other risk factor.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Obligation to transfer goods or services for which consideration has been received or is due (deferred revenue) under ASC 606.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Revenue recognized during the period that was included in the contract liability balance at the beginning of the period.

CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrinciple.description: Cumulative effect adjustment to retained earnings from the adoption of a new accounting standard.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Basis spread (margin) added to a variable reference rate (e.g., LIBOR, SOFR) to determine the interest rate on a debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Net carrying amount of a debt instrument on the balance sheet, including unamortized premium or discount.

DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPrice.description: Conversion price per share at which a convertible debt instrument can be converted into equity.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of the debt instrument as stated in the agreement.

DebtInstrumentFairValue.description: Estimated fair value of the debt instrument, typically disclosed for financial instruments carried at amortized cost.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: Effective interest rate on the debt instrument, reflecting the yield including discounts, premiums, and issuance costs.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Contractual stated (coupon) interest rate on the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentMaturityDate.description: Date when the debt instrument matures and the principal amount is due.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.description: Percentage of the principal amount at which the debt instrument may be redeemed.

DebtInstrumentTerm.description: Term or duration of the debt instrument from issuance to maturity.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.description: Unamortized discount on the debt instrument, representing the difference between face amount and initial carrying amount.

DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate across all outstanding debt instruments.

DeferredFinanceCostsGross.description: Gross amount of deferred financing costs (debt issuance costs) before accumulated amortization.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Net amount of deferred financing costs after accumulated amortization, presented as a reduction of debt carrying amount.

DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.description: Amount of employer contributions made to defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans during the period.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Cost recognized for employer contributions to defined contribution retirement plans (e.g., 401(k)).

Depreciation.description: Depreciation expense recognized for tangible property, plant, and equipment during the reporting period.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate specified in a derivative contract, such as an interest rate swap.

DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Notional (face) amount of a derivative instrument used to calculate payments under the contract.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Consideration received or expected to be received for a disposal group, including discontinued operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Effective income tax rate for continuing operations, calculated as income tax expense divided by pre-tax income.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Federal statutory income tax rate used as the starting point in the effective tax rate reconciliation.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Total unrecognized compensation cost for all non-vested share-based payment awards.
Weighted average period over which the unrecognized compensation cost for non-vested awards is expected to be recognized.
Total unrecognized compensation cost for non-vested share-based awards other than stock options (e.g., RSUs, restricted stock).

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Income tax benefit recognized related to share-based compensation expense during the period.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: Percentage of ownership interest in an investee accounted for under the equity method.

EquityMethodInvestments.description: Carrying amount of investments accounted for under the equity method on the balance sheet.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetUsefulLife.description: Estimated useful life of a finite-lived intangible asset used for amortization purposes.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Net gains or losses recognized on the early extinguishment or modification of debt instruments.

Goodwill.description: Carrying amount of goodwill recognized on the balance sheet, representing the excess of acquisition cost over identifiable net assets.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Impairment loss recognized when the carrying amount of a reporting unit's goodwill exceeds its implied fair value.

GuaranteeObligationsMaximumExposure.description: Maximum potential undiscounted future payments under guarantee obligations.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Income or loss recognized from equity method investments, representing the investor's proportionate share of investee earnings.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Total income tax expense or benefit recognized in the income statement for the reporting period.

InterestExpense.description: Total interest expense recognized during the period from all borrowings and financial obligations.

InterestExpenseDebt.description: Interest expense specifically attributable to debt instruments and borrowings.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Total lease and rental expense recognized for operating leases under legacy ASC 840 guidance.

LesseeOperatingLeaseRenewalTerm.description: Term of the lessee's option to renew an operating lease, if reasonably certain to be exercised.

LesseeOperatingLeaseTermOfContract.description: Term of the lessee's operating lease contract, including periods covered by options reasonably certain to be exercised.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: Outstanding amount of letters of credit issued under a credit facility, reducing available borrowing capacity.

LineOfCredit.description: Carrying amount of outstanding borrowings under a line of credit or revolving credit facility.

LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercent.description: Commitment fee percentage charged on the total committed amount of a line of credit facility.

LineOfCreditFacilityCurrentBorrowingCapa.description: Current borrowing capacity available under the line of credit facility, which may differ from the maximum.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.description: Interest rate on the line of credit facility as of the end of the reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.description: Maximum borrowing capacity under the line of credit facility as defined in the credit agreement.

LineOfCreditFacilityRemainingBorrowingCa.description: Remaining borrowing capacity available under the line of credit facility after outstanding borrowings and letters of credit.

LineOfCreditFacilityUnusedCapacityCommit.description: Commitment fee percentage charged on the unused portion of the line of credit facility.

LongTermDebt.description: Total carrying amount of long-term debt obligations on the balance sheet.

LongTermDebtFairValue.description: Estimated fair value of long-term debt, typically disclosed under ASC 825 fair value of financial instruments.

LossContingencyAccrualAtCarryingValue.description: Carrying amount of the accrued liability for a loss contingency when the loss is probable and estimable.

LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.description: Amount of damages sought by the plaintiff in a loss contingency litigation matter.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Estimated amount of possible loss from a loss contingency, disclosed when the loss is reasonably possible.

LossContingencyPendingClaimsNumber.description: Number of pending claims or lawsuits related to a loss contingency matter.

MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.description: Percentage of ownership interest held by non-controlling (minority) owners in a consolidated subsidiary.

MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByPar.description: Percentage of ownership interest held by the parent company in a consolidated subsidiary.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments identified by the entity under ASC 280.

NumberOfRealEstateProperties.description: Number of real estate properties owned, leased, or managed by the entity.

NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of reportable segments disclosed by the entity under ASC 280.

OperatingLeaseCost.description: Single lease cost for operating leases recognized on a straight-line basis under ASC 842.

OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Total operating lease expense recognized during the reporting period.

OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of operating lease payments recognized as a liability on the balance sheet under ASC 842.

OperatingLeasePayments.description: Cash payments made for operating leases during the reporting period.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Right-of-use asset recognized for operating leases on the balance sheet under ASC 842.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate used to calculate the present value of operating lease payments.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageRemainingLe.description: Weighted average remaining lease term for operating leases.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Net rental expense for operating leases recognized under legacy ASC 840 guidance, net of sublease income.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforwards available to offset future taxable income.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: Gross cash paid to acquire businesses before adjustments for cash acquired.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: Net cash paid to acquire businesses after deducting cash and cash equivalents acquired.

PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.description: Stated dividend rate percentage on preferred stock as specified in the corporate charter.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: Maximum number of preferred shares authorized for issuance under the corporate charter.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: Cash proceeds received from the issuance of common stock in public or private offerings.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLife.description: Estimated useful life of property, plant, and equipment used for depreciation purposes.

PublicUtilitiesRequestedRateIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of rate increase or decrease requested by a public utility from its regulatory authority.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Monetary amount of transactions with related parties during the reporting period.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized from transactions with related parties during the reporting period.

RepaymentsOfDebt.description: Cash outflow for repayment of principal on outstanding debt obligations.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost1.description: Total expected cost of a restructuring plan, including severance, facility exit costs, and other charges.

RestructuringCharges.description: Restructuring charges recognized during the period for employee termination benefits, facility closures, and contract terminations.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Revenue from contracts with customers excluding amounts collected on behalf of third parties (e.g., sales tax).

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Revenue from contracts with customers including taxes assessed by governmental authorities collected from customers.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Revenue recognized from transactions with related parties.

RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation.description: Transaction price allocated to remaining performance obligations that are unsatisfied or partially unsatisfied.

Revenues.description: Total revenue recognized during the reporting period from all sources.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: Number of shares issued in a stock sale transaction.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Price per share at which stock was sold in a transaction.

ShareBasedCompensation.description: Total share-based compensation expense recognized during the reporting period across all arrangements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Vesting period for share-based payment awards, typically expressed in years.
Number of equity instruments other than options (e.g., RSUs) granted during the period.
Weighted average grant date fair value of equity instruments other than options granted during the period.
Number of non-vested equity instruments other than options outstanding as of the balance sheet date.
Total fair value of equity instruments other than options that vested during the period.
Total number of shares authorized for issuance under a share-based compensation plan.
Number of shares remaining available for future grants under a share-based compensation plan.
Total intrinsic value of stock options exercised during the period (market price less exercise price times shares exercised).
Gross number of stock options granted during the period under share-based compensation plans.
Weighted average grant date fair value of stock options granted during the period.

SharePrice.description: Market price per share of the entity's common stock.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Percentage of share-based awards that vest based on service, performance, or market conditions.
Period from the grant date after which share-based payment awards expire if not exercised.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new shares issued during the period, excluding shares issued in business combinations or compensation plans.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Total dollar amount authorized for stock repurchases under an approved repurchase program.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.description: Remaining dollar amount available for future stock repurchases under the authorized program.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares repurchased and immediately retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares repurchased during the period, which may be held as treasury stock.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Prior year claims and claims adjustment expense development for property-casualty insurance underwriters.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Average cost per share of treasury stock acquired during the period.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of treasury shares acquired during the period.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Total cost of treasury stock acquired during the period under the cost method.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefits.description: Total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the financial statements.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: Portion of unrecognized tax benefits that would impact the effective income tax rate if recognized.
